title: Tony Quiroga (Car and Driver)
description: Tony Quiroga of Car and Driver stops by, we talk about auto journalism as a career, sleeper cars, Koenigsegg motor swaps, the S8, cylinder deactivation, and Ferrari.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
content:encoded: Tony Quiroga of Car and Driver stops by, we talk about auto journalism as a career, sleeper cars, Koenigsegg motor swaps, the S8, cylinder deactivation, and Ferrari.
